column4: Hi all, can someone please explain what a swap partition is and what it does. Im trying to install ubuntu on a newly created 10gb partition. I have 3 partition in total. Windows 20gb, linux 10gb and other, 120gb. Thanks
ah, so i should have 2 partitions for linux then. a 10gb partition and .5gb partition.
Is it safe to continure without a swap partition?
There is a way to use a swapfile.. but I dont know how and we dont support it.
